00008 #ifndef PS_BRANCHING_H_
00009 #define PS_BRANCHING_H_

00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Declaration and definition of the phase space branching base class, which *
00013  * serves as base for all objects splitting a channel into one or more other *
00014  * phase space channels.                                                     *
00015  *                                                                           *
00016  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00017 
00018 #include <Camorra/vector.h>
00019 #include <Camorra/bit_string.h>
00020 #include <Camorra/type_holders.h>
00021 #include <Camgen/rn_strm.h>
00022 #include <Camgen/ps_decl.h>
00023 #include <Camgen/MC_gen.h>
00024 #include <Camgen/s_gen.h>
00025 
00026 namespace Camorra
00027 {
00028     /* Base class template for phase space channel branching algorithms. */
00029 
00030     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class ps_branching: public MC_generator<typename model_t::value_type>
00031     {
00032         /* Friend classes: */
00033 
00034         friend class particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>;
00035         friend class ps_tree<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>;
00036         friend class ps_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t,typename model_t::spacetime_type>;
00037 
00038         /* Private type definitions: */
00039 
00040         typedef MC_generator<typename model_t::value_type> base_type;
00041 
00042         public:
00043 
00044             /* Public type definitions: */
00045 
00046             typedef model_t model_type;
00047             typedef typename get_spacetime_type<model_t>::type spacetime_type;
00048             typedef typename model_t::value_type value_type;
00049             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00050             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00051             typedef vector<typename model_t::value_type,model_t::dimension> momentum_type;
00052             typedef std::size_t size_type;
00053             typedef momentum_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t> ps_channel_type;
00054             typedef particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t> channel_type;
00055             typedef s_generator<value_type,rng_t> s_generator_type;
00056 
00057             static const std::size_t N_bits=N_in+N_out-1;
00058             static const std::size_t beam_direction=model_t::beam_direction;
00059             
00060             typedef bit_string<N_bits> bit_string_type;
00061 
00062             /* Public modifiers: */
00063             /*-------------------*/
00064 
00065             /* Recursively sets the redundant flag: */
00066             
00067             void set_redundant()
00068             {
00069                 redundant=true;
00070             }
00071 
00072             /* Recursively unsets the redundant flag: */
00073             
00074             virtual void unset_redundant()
00075             {
00076                 redundant=false;
00077                 for(size_type i=0;i<channels.size();++i)
00078                 {
00079                     channels[i]->unset_redundant();
00080                 }
00081             }
00082 
00083             /* Sets the generation flag to false: */
00084 
00085             void reset_generation_flags()
00086             {
00087                 generation_flag=false;
00088                 for(size_type i=0;i<channels.size();++i)
00089                 {
00090                     channels[i]->reset_generation_flags();
00091                 }
00092             }
00093 
00094             /* Sets the minimal pT for t-channel-produced external particles: */
00095 
00096             void set_pT_min(const value_type* pTmin_)
00097             {
00098                 pTmin=pTmin_;
00099             }
00100 
00101             /* Passes the channel picking procedure to the produced momentum
00102              * channels: */
00103 
00104             bool choose_channel(std::vector<ps_branching<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>*>& b)
00105             {
00106                 generation_flag=true;
00107                 ++callcount;
00108                 for(size_type i=0;i<channels.size();++i)
00109                 {
00110                     if(!channels[i]->choose_branching(b))
00111                     {
00112                         return false;
00113                     }
00114                 }
00115                 return true;
00116             }
00117 
00118             /* Generates positive invariants: */
00119 
00120             virtual bool generate_s()
00121             {
00122                 return true;
00123             }
00124 
00125             /* Generates negative invariants: */
00126 
00127             virtual bool generate_t()
00128             {
00129                 return true;
00130             }
00131 
00132             /* Generates momenta: */
00133 
00134             virtual bool generate_p()=0;
00135             
00136             /* Recursively generates momenta. */
00137             
00138             bool generate()
00139             {
00140                 if(!generate_s())
00141                 { 
00142                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00143                     return false;
00144                 }
00145                 if(!generate_t())
00146                 {
00147                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00148                     return false;
00149                 }
00150                 if(!generate_p())
00151                 {
00152                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00153                     return false;
00154                 }
00155                 for(size_type i=0;i<channels.size();++i)
00156                 {
00157                     if(!channels[i]->generate())
00158                     {
00159                         return false;
00160                     }
00161                 }
00162                 return true;
00163             }
00164 
00165             /* Computes the momentum branching weight. */
00166 
00167             virtual bool evaluate_branching_weight()=0;
00168 
00169             /* Computes the recursive channel branching weight. */
00170 
00171             bool evaluate_weight()
00172             {
00173                 value_type channel_weights=(value_type)1;
00174                 for(size_type i=0;i<channels.size();++i)
00175                 {
00176                     if(channels[i]->weight()==(value_type)0)
00177                     {
00178                         this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00179                         return false;
00180                     }
00181                     channel_weights*=channels[i]->weight();
00182                 }
00183                 if(!generation_flag)
00184                 {
00185                     if(!evaluate_branching_weight())
00186                     {
00187                         this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00188                         return false;
00189                     }
00190                 }
00191                 else if(this->weight()==(value_type)0)
00192                 {
00193                     return false;
00194                 }
00195                 this->weight()*=channel_weights;
00196                 return true;
00197             }
00198 
00199             /* Resets cross sections, adaptive grids and multichannels weights:
00200              * */
00201 
00202             virtual void reset()
00203             {
00204                 this->base_type::reset();
00205                 callcount=0;
00206                 generation_flag=false;
00207             }
00208 
00209             /* Adapts grids: */
00210 
00211             virtual void adapt_grids(){}
00212 
00213             /* Adapts multichannel weights: */
00214 
00215             virtual void adapt_channels(){}
00216 
00217             /* Full adaptation method: */
00218 
00219             void adapt()
00220             {
00221                 adapt_grids();
00222                 adapt_channels();
00223             }
00224             
00225             /* Public readout functions: */
00226             /*---------------------------*/
00227 
00228             /* Number of outgoing phase space channels. */
00229 
00230             size_type out_rank() const
00231             {
00232                 return channels.size();
00233             }
00234 
00235             bool t_type() const
00236             {
00237                 return channels[0]->spacelike();
00238             }
00239 
00240             /* Returns a const reference to the incoming momentum. */
00241             
00242             const momentum_type& p_in() const
00243             {
00244                 return incoming_channel->p();
00245             }
00246 
00247             /* Returns the total outgoing momentum. */
00248 
00249             momentum_type p_out() const
00250             {
00251                 momentum_type p(channels[0]->p());
00252                 for(size_type i=1;i<channels.size();++i)
00253                 {
00254                     p+=channels[i]->p();
00255                 }
00256                 return p;
00257             }
00258 
00259             /* Returns a reference to the i-th outgoing momentum. */
00260 
00261             momentum_type& p_out(size_type i)
00262             {
00263                 return channels[i]->p();
00264             }
00265 
00266             /* Returns a const reference to the i-th outgoing momentum. */
00267 
00268             const momentum_type& p_out(size_type i) const
00269             {
00270                 return channels[i]->p();
00271             }
00272             
00273             /* Returns a const reference to the incoming invariant
00274             mass-squared. */
00275             
00276             const value_type& s_in() const
00277             {
00278                 return incoming_channel->s();
00279             }
00280 
00281             /* Returns a reference to the i-th outgoing invariant mass-squared.
00282              * */
00283 
00284             value_type& s_out(size_type i)
00285             {
00286                 return channels[i]->s();
00287             }
00288 
00289             /* Returns a const reference to the i-th outgoing invariant
00290              * mass-squared. */
00291 
00292             const value_type& s_out(size_type i) const
00293             {
00294                 return channels[i]->s();
00295             }
00296             
00297             /* Returns a const reference to the incoming invariant mass. */
00298             
00299             const value_type& m_in() const
00300             {
00301                 return incoming_channel->m();
00302             }
00303 
00304             /* Returns a reference to the i-th outgoing invariant mass. */
00305 
00306             const value_type& m_out(size_type i) const
00307             {
00308                 return channels[i]->m();
00309             }
00310 
00311             /* Returns the type identifyer for printing. */
00312 
00313             virtual std::string type() const=0;
00314 
00315             /* Returns the redundancy flag. */
00316 
00317             bool is_redundant() const
00318             {
00319                 return redundant;
00320             }
00321 
00322             /* Returns the minimal pT for t-channel-produced external particles: */
00323 
00324             value_type pT_min() const
00325             {
00326                 return (pTmin==NULL)?(value_type)0:(*pTmin);
00327             }
00328 
00329             /* Returns equivalence of branchings: */
00330 
00331             virtual bool equiv(const ps_branching<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* other) const
00332             {
00333                 return false;
00334             }
00335 
00336             /* Returns the maximally allowed s-pair throws per event: */
00337 
00338             size_type max_s_pairs() const
00339             {
00340                 return (spairs==NULL)?1:(*spairs);
00341             }
00342 
00343             /* Serialization: */
00344             /*----------------*/
00345 
00346             /* Printing method. */
00347 
00348             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) const
00349             {
00350                 std::stringstream ss1;
00351                 size_type n=out_rank()-1;
00352                 for(size_type i=0;i<n;++i)
00353                 {
00354                     ss1<<channels[i]->name<<",";
00355                 }
00356                 ss1<<channels.back()->name;
00357                 os<<std::setw(2*(N_in+N_out)+20)<<std::left<<ss1.str();
00358                 os<<std::setw(15)<<std::left<<type();
00359                 os<<std::setw(15)<<std::left<<this->weight();
00360                 os<<std::setw(15)<<std::left<<alpha;
00361                 os<<std::setw(15)<<std::left<<callcount;
00362                 os<<std::setw(15)<<std::left<<W/callcount;
00363                 os<<std::setw(10)<<std::left<<generation_flag;
00364                 return os;
00365             }
00366 
00367             /* Overridden loading method: */
00368 
00369             std::istream& load(std::istream& is)
00370             {
00371                 this->base_type::load(is);
00372                 safe_read(is,alpha);
00373                 safe_read(is,W);
00374                 is>>callcount;
00375                 load_data(is);
00376                 return is;
00377             }
00378 
00379             /* Virtual method for derived classes to load their subclass-data:
00380              * */
00381 
00382             virtual std::istream& load_data(std::istream& is)
00383             {
00384                 return is;
00385             }
00386 
00387             /* Overridden saving method: */
00388 
00389             std::ostream& save(std::ostream& os) const
00390             {
00391                 os<<"<branching>"<<std::endl;
00392                 os<<type()<<std::endl;
00393                 save_channels(os);
00394                 this->base_type::save(os);
00395                 safe_write(os,alpha);
00396                 os<<"\t";
00397                 safe_write(os,W);
00398                 os<<"\t"<<callcount<<std::endl;
00399                 save_data(os);
00400                 os<<"</branching>"<<std::endl;
00401                 return os;
00402             }
00403 
00404             /* Virtual method for derived classes to save their subclass-data:
00405              * */
00406 
00407             virtual std::ostream& save_data(std::ostream& os) const
00408             {
00409                 return os;
00410             }
00411 
00412             virtual std::ostream& save_channels(std::ostream& os) const
00413             {
00414                 os<<incoming_channel->name;
00415                 os<<std::endl;
00416                 for(size_type i=0;i<channels.size();++i)
00417                 {
00418                     os<<channels[i]->name<<"\t";
00419                 }
00420                 os<<std::endl;
00421                 return os;
00422             }

00424         protected:
00425 
00426             /* Inupt phase space channel: */
00427             
00428             channel_type* incoming_channel;
00429 
00430             /* Outgoing phase space channels: */
00431 
00432             std::vector<channel_type*>channels;
00433 
00434             /* Mininal pT of external legs in coulomb-like t-channel: */
00435 
00436             const value_type* pTmin;
00437 
00438             /* Constructor. */
00439             
00440             ps_branching(channel_type* incoming_channel_,size_type n_out):incoming_channel(incoming_channel_),pTmin(NULL),generation_flag(false),W(0),redundant(true),callcount(0),spairs(NULL)
00441             {
00442                 if(!(n_out>0))
00443                 {
00444                     LOG(error)<<"Invalid branching of rank 0 constructed..."<<ENDLOG(error);
00445                     return;
00446                 }
00447                 channels.resize(n_out,NULL);
00448             }
00449 
00450             /* Returns the i-th outgoing particle channel: */
00451 
00452             channel_type* channel(size_type i)
00453             {
00454                 return channels[i];
00455             }
00456 
00457             /* Returns the i-th const outgoing particle channel: */
00458 
00459             const channel_type* channel(size_type i) const
00460             {
00461                 return channels[i];
00462             }
00463 
00464             /* Returns whether the argument branching has the same channels: */
00465 
00466             bool same_channels(const ps_branching<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* other,bool sorted=true) const
00467             {
00468                 if(incoming_channel!=other->incoming_channel)
00469                 {
00470                     return false;
00471                 }
00472                 if(sorted)
00473                 {
00474                     return (channels==other->channels);
00475                 }
00476                 else
00477                 {
00478                     std::set<channel_type*>s1,s2;
00479                     s1.insert(channels.begin(),channels.end());
00480                     s2.insert(other->channels.begin(),other->channels.end());
00481                     return (s1==s2);
00482                 }
00483             }
00484 
00485             /* Returns whether the incoming channel has the same incoming
00486              * channel: */
00487 
00488             bool same_incoming_channel(const ps_branching<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* other) const
00489             {
00490                 return (incoming_channel==other->incoming_channel);
00491             }
00492

00498             /* Generation flag: */

00502             /* Multichannel weight: */
00503 
00504             value_type alpha;
00505             
00506             /* Multichannel variance measure: */
00507             
00508             value_type W;

00510             /* Redundancy flag: */

00524             ps_branching():spairs(NULL){}

00526     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>const std::size_t ps_branching<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::beam_direction;
00527     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>const std::size_t ps_branching<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::N_bits;
00528     
00529     /* Orders two branching instances by decreasing multichannel weight. */
00530 
00531     template<class spacetime_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>bool multichannel_ordering(const ps_branching<spacetime_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* b1,const ps_branching<spacetime_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* b2)
00532     {
00533         return b1->alpha>b2->alpha;
00534     }
00535 }
